Articles.Content: What if you had the option to make different Launchpads that look like RL pads like Cape Canaveral the the MRS, Bailkonour Kourou etc.. This would be implemented after the 1.0 release.

Mine would be a dirt patch, on the back of some farmers field.

I do not need fancy laggy buildings to launch a rocket.

OH and a rusty red pickup truck to haul the astronauts from the parking lot, to the craft. Yes, my launch area would (gasp) actually contain a road.

Mine would be a dirt patch, on the back of some farmers field.

I do not need fancy laggy buildings to launch a rocket.

OH and a rusty red pickup truck to haul the astronauts from the parking lot, to the craft. Yes, my launch area would (gasp) actually contain a road.

I like your way of thinking, space cowboy.

But anyway, this is a fine idea. It would allow editing of buildings to help with lag and personal preference.

Maybe when you set up a new world, they give you a bunch of buildings, trees, roads and stuff and you can plop them down to the amount of funds you have. IT would be perfect for career mode. If I want a SPH I have to make money to place it down.

Mine would be a dirt patch, on the back of some farmers field.

I do not need fancy laggy buildings to launch a rocket.

OH and a rusty red pickup truck to haul the astronauts from the parking lot, to the craft. Yes, my launch area would (gasp) actually contain a road.

Parking lot???

Wow, that is ambitious
